title: Drawing, "End Table", ca. 1934
medium: Graphite and brown color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/501 MADISON AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at upper margin right: 1 right/1 left; inscribed in graphite at lower left: #2; inscribed in graphite at upper left: 2-; inscribed in graphite, lower right: SCALE 1 1/2"==1'0"/#/8284 [circled]; dimensions, materials in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for mahogany low end table. Left side of end table with rounded edge. Two shelves on left side and two vertical shelves at right, probably for magazines.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "End Table", ca. 1934.
ca. 1934. Graphite and brown color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-887.
